author: makortel
body:
This PR updates the tracking MC validation scripts, notable updates are
- Add default plots
  * zoomed-in dzy/dz vs PV (histograms were added in #17591)
  * plots for B-hadron TrackingParticles (only in trackingOnly mode, histograms were added in #17591)
  * PackedCandidate layers (histograms were added in #15605)
- Add "extended plots"
  * track parameter and vertex position residuals
  * vertex x/y diff wrt. beamspot, x/y/z uncertainties (from DQM)
- Replace numbering `effandfakeN` and `dupandfakeN` file names with proper names (e.g. 1 -> PtEtaPhi)
- Show true/fake/pileup rates vs. seeding layer sets also as an HTML table
- Update timing plots to use the convention of the updated FastTimerService,  update the lists of modules of interest
- Add an example of how to add custom MTV instances for subselections of generalTracks (e.g. in eta-phi slices) and how to easily plot them

Tested in 9_3_0_pre2, no effect on standard workflows.

@rovere @VinInn @ebrondol
title: Update tracking MC validation scripts
